mapper.select: select COUNT(*) from wish WHERE size_no in (select no from size WHERE product_no = #{product_no})
select EXISTS(select * from wish WHERE size_no in (select no from size WHERE product_no = #{product_no}) AND user_no = #{user_no})
select EXISTS(select * from wish where user_no = #{user_no} AND size_no = #{size_no})
mapper.delete: delete from wish WHERE user_no = #{user_no} AND size_no in (select no from size WHERE product_no = #{product_no})
